text: allahuve sambandhicca bhaktiyinmelum avanre pritiyinmelum tanre kettitam sthapiccavanea atalla, pealinnuvilan peakunna oru manaltittayute vakkatt kettitam sthapikkukayum ennittat tanneyum keant narakagniyil pealinnuvilukayum ceytavanea kututal uttaman? akramikalaya janannale allahu nervaliyilakkukayilla
